FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Course studentquiz activity belongs to

FIELD.NAME: coursemodule
FIELD.COMMENT: Coursemodule studentquiz activity belongs to

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: name field for moodle instances

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: General introduction of the studentquiz activity

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the intro field (MOODLE, HTML, MARKDOWN...)

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum grade. Can be negative to indicate the use of a scale.

FIELD.NAME: anonymrank
FIELD.COMMENT: Setting to show ranking anonym or not.

FIELD.NAME: quizpracticebehaviour
FIELD.COMMENT: Displays the question behaviour selected by teachers

FIELD.NAME: questionquantifier
FIELD.COMMENT: Point factor multiplied with number of questions contributed

FIELD.NAME: approvedquantifier
FIELD.COMMENT: Point factor multiplied with the number of approved questions created

FIELD.NAME: ratequantifier
FIELD.COMMENT: Point factor multiplied with average rating per question

FIELD.NAME: correctanswerquantifier
FIELD.COMMENT: Point factor multiplied with number of correct answers

FIELD.NAME: incorrectanswerquantifier
FIELD.COMMENT: Point factor multiplied with number of incorrect answers

FIELD.NAME: allowedqtypes
FIELD.COMMENT: Which question types are allowed

FIELD.NAME: aggregated
FIELD.COMMENT: Property if studentquiz instance is using aggregated values

FIELD.NAME: excluderoles
FIELD.COMMENT: Property which system roles are excluded in the ranking

FIELD.NAME: forcerating
FIELD.COMMENT: Property if rating is enforced in question attempt

FIELD.NAME: forcecommenting
FIELD.COMMENT: Property if commenting is enforced in question attempt

FIELD.NAME: opensubmissionfrom
FIELD.COMMENT: If non-zero, then users cannot create questions to the StudentQuiz until the specified date

FIELD.NAME: closesubmissionfrom
FIELD.COMMENT: If non-zero, users cannot create questions to the StudentQuiz after the specified date

FIELD.NAME: openansweringfrom
FIELD.COMMENT: If non-zero, then users cannot attempt questions until the specified date

FIELD.NAME: closeansweringfrom
FIELD.COMMENT: If non-zero, users cannot attempt questions after the specified date

FIELD.NAME: publishnewquestion
FIELD.COMMENT: Setting to automatically publish new created question

FIELD.NAME: commentdeletionperiod
FIELD.COMMENT: Define deletion period for user can able to delete a comment.

FIELD.NAME: reportingemail
FIELD.COMMENT: Email address for reporting unacceptable comments

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of question

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of user
